title: Bath Amenities
description: Bath, hair dryer, Mikado shampoo and conditioner, body soap, hot water, and shower gel.

title: Laundry
description: Free washer and dryer in unit, towels, bed sheets, hangers, bed linen, and room-darkening blinds.

title: Entertainment
description: TV, pool table, arcade games, and an in-house cinema.

title: Family Friendly
description: Cot provided for infants (52" x 28"), extra pillows and blankets included.

title: Heating and Cooling
description: Air conditioning, indoor fireplace, and central heating for year-round comfort.

title: Home Safety
description: Exterior cameras, smoke alarm, carbon monoxide alarm, fire extinguisher, and first aid kit.

title: High-Speed Wifi
description: Fast and reliable WiFi available throughout the cabin.

title: Workspace
description: Dedicated workspace available for remote work or study.

title: Kitchen
description: Fully equipped with refrigerator, oven, microwave, cooking basics, dishes, cutlery, coffee maker, and more.

title: Outdoor
description: Private patio or balcony, BBQ grill, dining area, outdoor furniture, and sun loungers.

title: Parking & Facilities
description: Free driveway parking for 4 cars, pool, hot tub, and EV charging station (Level 2).

title: Self Check-In
description: Smart keypad entry allows flexible and secure self check-in.
